release.action: Important change: The BaseValueParser now consistently returns null for all get-methods that return an Object, if the parameter name does not exist. This changes the behaviour of getBigDecimal which used to return 0 in this case.

Made ValueParser and BaseValueParser locale-aware. Note that the default locale used is always the default value of the JVM which is different from the previous behaviour where the locale used was sometimes Locale.US (for float, double and BigDecimal) and sometimes the JVM-default (for dates).
Totally refactored the component to provide correctly initialized parser objects.
Port parser fixes of Turbine 2.3.2 over to the component.
Add javabean get/set for dependent upload service to DefaultParameterParser.
Basic unit test verifying that the default parser starts up.
Change to commons-logger to be more friendly to who ever uses this code.
Removed use of old Log4j Category in favor of Logger.
